page.title: 05CARBOST PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school has two teachers for 25 pupils-13 girls and 12 boys.The children are in composite classes,one being for Primaries 1-3 and the other for Primaries 4-7.The rest of the staff consists of a visiting Art teacher and Gaelic teacher.We also have a cleaner and a dining assistant. The school consists of one main building which is used as a canteen and G.P.room.,and two huts for classrooms.The toilets are outside in a separate unit. The school is situated in a most scenic spot,1 mile from the village.It sits at the top of the hill,with views of Loch Harport and the Black and Red Cullins. There is plenty of space to play in and lots of wooden adventure equipment to play on,built by Mr.Donaldson.
